Hybrid¶

TODO: write documentation.

Hybrid python documentation¶

hybrid.hybrid.ck_loop(prototype='hello world')¶

the main loop thread for the Codeklavier to listen to incoming midi messages

Parameters:prototype (string) – The name of the prototype to process
hybrid.hybrid.gong_bomb(countdown, debug=False)¶

function to kill all running processes and finish the piece with a gong bomb. i.e. a GOMB!

countdown: the countdown time in seconds

hybrid.hybrid.main()¶

Start the Hybrid prototype

Parameters:configfile (string) – The configurationfile to use. Defaults to default_setup.ini
hybrid.hybrid.noteCounter(timer=10, numberOfnotes=100, result_num=1, debug=True)¶

Parameters:
  • timer (int) – todo
  • numberOfnotes (int) – todo
  • result_num (int) – todo
  • debug (bool) – run in debug mode
hybrid.hybrid.rangeCounter(timer='', operator='', num=1, result_num=1, piano_range=72, debug=True, perpetual=True)¶

Calculate the played range within a time window. Perpetual flag makes it run it’s loop forever, unless range_trigger is != 1

Parameters:
  • timer – time window loop
  • operator – ‘more than’ or ‘less than’
  • num (int) – conditional number
  • result_num (int) – result number mapped to this conditional
  • piano_range (int) – total range for evvaluation in semitones
  • debug (bool) – booelan flag to post debug messages
  • perpetual (bool) – boolean flag to make the function loop infinetly or 1 shot ## reserved for future versions
hybrid.hybrid.set_parameters(value, conditional_func, debug=False)¶

function to parse a full range tremolo. This value can be used as a param for the other functions.

Parameters:
  • value (int) – the interval of the plated tremolo
  • conditional_func – todo
  • debug (bool) – run in debug mode
